content: mosaic afghan tile pattern by hooked by maxine materials american terms used lion brand feels like butta ● color 1/main color ice one skein single_crochet single_crochet ○ approximately 100 yards double_crochet double_crochet ● color 2 royal blue one skein st stitch ○ approximately 150 yards slip_stitch slip_stitch 4 5mm/g hook magic_ring magic_ring tapestry needle 3inc 3 single_crochet stitches in the same scissors stitch pattern notes please read this square pattern is made using in-the-round and center-out mosaic crochet technique ● work only one color per round when you reach the end of the round drop the yarn that you are no longer working with and switch the colors ○ unlike traditional mosaic crochet do not cut the yarn after each round instead you will allow the unused yarn to hang and carry it up at the next round ○ the round number odd vs even determines which color to use odd number rounds are color 1 even number rounds are color 2 ● all single_crochet stitches are made into the back loops ● all double_crochet stitches are made into the front loops of the stitch in the round below the single_crochet stitch in the round in between will be covered behind this dropped stitch ● 3inc stitches are made in each of the 4 corners and are comprised of 3 single_crochet made into the same st ● if you are using the chart found on the last page an x indicates a double_crochet stitch a solid square indicates a single_crochet mosaic afghan tile round1 8scinmr round2 3inc single_crochet x4 ssintofirststandswitchcolors 16sts round3 single_crochet 3inc
